disableKeyguard().Description: Disable the keyguard from showing. If the keyguard is currently showing, hide it. The keyguard will be prevented from showing again until @B_android#app#KeyguardManager#KeyguardLock#reenableKeyguard_E@ is called. A good place to call this is from @B_android#app#Activity#onResume_E@ Note: This call has no effect while any @B_android#app#admin#DevicePolicyManager_E@ is enabled that requires a password. Requires @B_android#Manifest#permission#DISABLE_KEYGUARD_E@
disableKeyguard().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 15

reenableKeyguard().Description: Reenable the keyguard. The keyguard will reappear if the previous call to @B_android#app#KeyguardManager#KeyguardLock#disableKeyguard_E@ caused it to be hidden. A good place to call this is from @B_android#app#Activity#onPause_E@ Note: This call has no effect while any @B_android#app#admin#DevicePolicyManager_E@ is enabled that requires a password. Requires @B_android#Manifest#permission#DISABLE_KEYGUARD_E@
reenableKeyguard().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 15

ClassDesc: Use @B_android#view#WindowManager#LayoutParams#FLAG_DISMISS_KEYGUARD_E@ and/or @B_android#view#WindowManager#LayoutParams#FLAG_SHOW_WHEN_LOCKED_E@ instead; this allows you to seamlessly hide the keyguard as your application moves in and out of the foreground and does not require that any special permissions be requested. Handle returned by @B_android#app#KeyguardManager#newKeyguardLock_E@ that allows you to disable / reenable the keyguard.
